content.question: The American Federation of Labor under the leadership of Samuel Gompers organized

choices.label: skilled workers in craft unions in order to achieve economic gains
all industrial and agricultural workers in “one big union”
workers and intellectuals into a labor party for political action
workers into a fraternal organization to provide unemployment and old-age benefits

content.answer: skilled workers in craft unions in order to achieve economic gains

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
